About Syrna

Syrna is an end-to-end, extensible management tool. It's not just software, it's a platform for doing and managing business.

Why we created Syrna

We launched this project to address the need for a flexible, extensible, manageable, sustainable, and compatible management information system. The XMS concept is essentially a platform. All processes, from software production to operation, are conducted using online techniques.

Our Story

Development work began in 2003 to address the need to code and manage the Kenthaber portal. Subsequently, the ERP product, now in production, continued to expand its scope and capabilities.

What we do

Syrna Generator, Syrna ERP, Syrna Framework, and Syrna management procedures provide a turnkey solution. The standard coding structure and the ability to develop without requiring any coding knowledge ensure extremely low post-installation maintenance and operating costs.

Behind every great product, there is a great mind.

This is our story.

We’re here for those who refuse to settle. Who never stop moving forwards. Who continue to search for new ideas and better experiences in everything they do. Because today’s hyper-connected world deserves a financial partner just as progressive.One that adapts to your needs, gives you control and constantly pushes you into new exciting spaces.

We are hunting Genius Developers

Our expert and talented colleagues, who have seen and written about all the transition phases up to the modern software development process and have left their mark on the industry for more than 40 years, have rolled up their sleeves to bring new genius software developers to the industry.
